name: KeyStone Learning Systems
tag_list: microsoft-office-training, microsoft-training, custom-training, learning-solutions, security-awareness-training, office-support, content-management
overview:
KeyStone Learning Systems provides both custom and off-the-shelf training for Microsoft and other IT software as well as compliance training including Security Awareness and Privacy Training.

KeyStone pioneered video-based software training twenty years ago and continues to provide great courses by top instructors delivered in easy-to-use formats.

Whether you need to support an internal training requirement, a global rollout, or a client requirement, KeyStone can provide the training and services you need to ensure a successful outcome with measurable results and a clear Return on Investment.

KeyStone’s experience in video-based, instructor-led learning has provided a wealth of knowledge in the training arena, with 20 years of experience supporting enterprise services, including custom design, knowledgebase and learning management, security compliance, and sales/marketing support.

KeyStone’s award-winning products have been deployed successfully in Fortune 500 companies, educational institutions, and large government organizations across the country and around the world.

Because technology-delivered learning design and production are complicated, you need a company with a proven record. KeyStone’s experts know the issues affecting managers who are responsible for training the workforce, as well as the issues affecting instructors who are responsible for teaching students. A few of the concerns customers are dealing with every day include training more people â€” perhaps with fewer dollars â€” and making learning available on a larger scale than ever before, being accountable for learning results, and leveraging existing and new technology.
